comment: по клику на любые мертвые тела лежащие

languages.text: Кругом столько мертвецов. Откуда?.. Это Кунрад! Будь проклят Кунрад за то, что сотворил с твоим экипажем!
There are so many dead people around you. How? It must be Voigtvir! Damn him for what he has done to your crew!
languages.original_text: Кругом столько мертвецов. Откуда?.. Это Кунрад! Будь проклят Кунрад за то, что сотворил с твоим экипажем!

traits.locale_text: There are so many dead people around you. How? It must be Kunrad! Damn Kunrad for what he has done to your crew!
There are so many dead people around you. How? It must be Kunrad! Damn Kunrad for what he has done to your crew!
There are so many dead people around you. How? It must be Voigtvir! Damn him for what he has done to your crew!
There are so many dead people around you. How? It must be Voigtvir! Damn him for what he has done to your crew!
There are so many dead people around you. How? It must be Voigtvir! Damn him for what he has done to your crew!

languages.text: 你周围有这么多死人，这到底是怎么回事？这肯定是维特威尔干的！他居然对你的船员做了这样的事情，他真该死！
languages.original_text: There are so many dead people around you. How? It must be Voigtvir! Damn him for what he has done to your crew!

traits.locale_text: 你周围有这么多死人，这到底是怎么回事？这肯定是维特威尔干的！他居然对你的船员做了这样的事情，他真该死！

languages.text: 周りには多くの死者がいる。なぜだ？ボイトヴィルの仕業に違いない！クルーへの行いに対する神罰を彼に与えよ！
languages.original_text: There are so many dead people around you. How? It must be Voigtvir! Damn him for what he has done to your crew!

traits.locale_text: 周りには多くの死者がいる。なぜだ？ボイトヴィルの仕業に違いない！クルーへの行いに対する神罰を彼に与えよ！

languages.text: Il y a tant de morts autour de vous. Comment est-ce possible ? Ce doit être Voigtvir ! Maudit soit-il pour ce qu'il a fait à votre équipage !
languages.original_text: There are so many dead people around you. How? It must be Voigtvir! Damn him for what he has done to your crew!

traits.locale_text: Il y a tant de morts autour de vous. Comment est-ce possible ? Ce doit être Voigtvir ! Maudit soit-il pour ce qu'il a fait à votre équipage !

languages.text: Hay muchísimos cadáveres a tu alrededor. ¿Qué ha pasado aquí? ¡Debe de ser obra de Voigtvir! ¡Pagará por lo que le ha hecho a tu tripulación!
languages.original_text: There are so many dead people around you. How? It must be Voigtvir! Damn him for what he has done to your crew!

traits.locale_text: Hay muchísimos cadáveres a tu alrededor. ¿Qué ha pasado aquí? ¡Debe de ser obra de Voigtvir! ¡Pagará por lo que le ha hecho a tu tripulación!

languages.text: Du bist von so viele Toten umgeben. Wie? Das muss Voigtvir sein! Verflucht soll er sein für das, was er deiner Crew angetan hat.
languages.original_text: There are so many dead people around you. How? It must be Voigtvir! Damn him for what he has done to your crew!

traits.locale_text: Du bist von so viele Toten umgeben. Wie? Das muss Voigtvir sein! Verflucht soll er sein für das, was er deiner Crew angetan hat.

languages.text: Etrafın cesetlerle dolu. Nasıl mı? Kesin Voigtvir'in işi! Mürettebatına yaptıklarının bedelini ödeyecek!
languages.original_text: There are so many dead people around you. How? It must be Voigtvir! Damn him for what he has done to your crew!

traits.locale_text: Etrafında bir sürü ceset var. Nasıl mı? Kesin Voigtvir'in işi! Mürettebatına yaptıklarının bedelini öder elbet!
